TopicTitle: Sending My First Probe To Eve

Articles.Content:
With successful missions to the Mun, Minmus and Duna I have decided to set my gaze out to the other planets in the solar system. So I set my sights on Eve and decided to send a probe there, much as I did with Duna, to learn about the planet and how best to do subsequent manned missions to that wonderfully purple planet. So I hope you enjoy the mission video below, and as always I would love any feedback/suggestion that could make my missions go more smoothly.

Thanks for watching
